sqlMap.sql: AGENCY_ID, SYSTEMID, CONTACTSNAME, COMPANYNAME, COMPANYPHONE, COMPANYEMAIL, COMPANYADDR, CERTIFICATES, LEGAL_INFO, ORGANIZATIONCODE, AGREEMENTCODE, PROVINCEID, CITYID, ONLINECHANNEL, VESTAGENCY, AGENCY_STATUS, ACCOUNTBANK, BANKID, ACCOUNTNAME, BANKCODE, CREATEID, CREATEDT, AGENCYDESC, COMPANYBRIEFNAME, VESTBRAND, BOUNCEDTIME, RENAMECOMPANYNAME, STATUS, USERPID, SOMEONEPHONE, SOMEONENAME
sqlMap.select:
select DISTINCT T1.AGENCY_ID as agency_id, T1.COMPANYNAME as companyName,
T1.COMPANYBRIEFNAME as companyBriefName, T1.ContactsName AS ContactsName, T1.ONLINECHANNEL as upperAgencyid, GETUPPERAGENCYNAMEBYID(T1.ONLINECHANNEL) as uppercompanyName, T1.VESTAGENCY as vestagencyId, T1.VESTBRAND as vestBrandId, T1.someoneName as someoneName, T1.someonePhone as someonePhone,
CASE WHEN #depagencyId#='RTB00000000' OR GETPARENTAGENCYID(#depagencyId#)='RTB00000000' THEN GETAGENCYNAMEBYID(T1.VESTAGENCY) WHEN T1.VESTBRAND IS NULL THEN GETAGENCYNAMEBYID(T1.VESTAGENCY) ELSE GETAGENCYNAMEBYID(T1.VESTBRAND) END as vestagencyName, CASE WHEN T1.VESTBRAND IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE '2' END as agencyType, T1.COMPANYPHONE as companyPhone, T1.COMPANYEMAIL as companyEmail, T1.COMPANYADDR as companyAddr, T1.CERTIFICATES as certificate, T1.LEGAL_INFO as legal_info, T1.ORGANIZATIONCODE as organizationCode, T1.AGREEMENTCODE as agreementcode, T1.PROVINCEID as provinceId, T1.CITYID as cityId, GETCITYNAMEBYID(CITYID) as cityName , GETPROVINCENAMEBYID(PROVINCEID) as provinceName, T1.AGENCY_STATUS as agency_status, case when T1.AGENCY_STATUS='1' then '机构未激活' when T1.AGENCY_STATUS='2' then '机构未实名' when T1.AGENCY_STATUS='3' then '机构已实名' else '无效' end as agencystatusSrc, T1.ACCOUNTBANK as AccountBank, T1.BANKID as bankId, T1.ACCOUNTNAME as accountName, T1.BANKCODE as bankcode, GETUSERNAMEBYID(T1.CREATEID) as createId, T1.CREATEDT as createDt, T1.SYSTEMID AS systemId, GETSYSTEMNAMEBYID(T1.SYSTEMID) as systemName, T1.AGENCYDESC AS agencydesc, case when T2.STATUS='0' then '未激活' when T2.STATUS='1' then '已激活' end as status, case when T2.STATUS = '0' then T2.REGISTER_URL when T2.STATUS = '1' then '已失效' end AS REGISTERURL, T2.ACT_TIME AS actTime from rtb_qt1tblagency T1 left join rtb_agency_setup T2 on T1.agency_id = T2.agency_id where 1=1
AND T1.SYSTEMID=#systemId#
AND T1.PROVINCEID=#provinceId#
AND T1.CITYID=#cityId#
and T1.AGENCY_ID=#agency_id#
and T1.COMPANYNAME like '%$companyName$%'
and T1.agency_status=#agency_status#
and T2.STATUS=#status#
and T1.ONLINECHANNEL=#depagencyId# or T1.AGENCY_ID=#depagencyId#
START WITH T1.AGENCY_ID =#depagencyId# CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.AGENCY_ID = T1.ONLINECHANNEL

select count(1) from rtb_qt1tblagency T1 left join rtb_agency_setup T2 on T1.agency_id = T2.agency_id where 1=1
AND T1.SYSTEMID=#systemId#
AND T1.PROVINCEID=#provinceId#
AND T1.CITYID=#cityId#
and T1.AGENCY_ID=#agency_id#
and T1.COMPANYNAME like '%$companyName$%'
and T1.agency_status=#agency_status#
and T2.STATUS=#status#
and T1.ONLINECHANNEL=#depagencyId# or T1.AGENCY_ID=#depagencyId#
START WITH T1.AGENCY_ID =#depagencyId# CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.AGENCY_ID = T1.ONLINECHANNEL

SELECT Y.BOUNCEDTIME FROM rtb_qt1tblagency Y LEFT JOIN USERS S ON S.AGENCYID=Y.AGENCY_ID WHERE 1=1
AND userid=#userid#

SELECT SYSTEMID,AGENCY_STATUS FROM rtb_qt1tblagency WHERE 1=1
AND AGENCY_ID=#agency_id#

select * from (select b.*, rownum rn from (select a.AGENCY_ID as agency_id, a.COMPANYNAME as companyName, a.COMPANYBRIEFNAME as companyBriefName, a.ContactsName AS ContactsName, a.ONLINECHANNEL as upperAgencyid, GETUPPERAGENCYNAMEBYID(a.ONLINECHANNEL) as uppercompanyName, a.VESTAGENCY as vestagencyId, a.VESTBRAND as vestBrandId, CASE WHEN #depagencyId#='RTB00000000' OR GETPARENTAGENCYID(#depagencyId#)='RTB00000000' THEN GETAGENCYNAMEBYID(a.VESTAGENCY) WHEN a.VESTBRAND IS NULL THEN GETAGENCYNAMEBYID(a.VESTAGENCY) ELSE GETAGENCYNAMEBYID(A.VESTBRAND) END as vestagencyName, CASE WHEN A.VESTBRAND IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE '2' END as agencyType, a.COMPANYPHONE as companyPhone, a.COMPANYEMAIL as companyEmail, a.userpId, a.COMPANYADDR as companyAddr, a.CERTIFICATES as certificate, a.LEGAL_INFO as legal_info, a.ORGANIZATIONCODE as organizationCode, a.AGREEMENTCODE as agreementcode, a.PROVINCEID as provinceId, a.CITYID as cityId, a.someonePhone, a.someoneName, GETCITYNAMEBYID(CITYID) as cityName, GETPROVINCENAMEBYID(PROVINCEID) as provinceName, a.AGENCY_STATUS as agency_status, case when A.AGENCY_STATUS='1' then '机构未激活' when A.AGENCY_STATUS='2' then '机构未实名' when A.AGENCY_STATUS='3' then '机构已实名' else '无效' end as agencystatusSrc, a.ACCOUNTBANK as AccountBank, a.BANKID as bankId, a.ACCOUNTNAME as accountName, a.BANKCODE as bankcode, GETUSERNAMEBYID(a.CREATEID) as createId, a.CREATEDT as createDt, a.SYSTEMID AS systemId, GETSYSTEMNAMEBYID(a.SYSTEMID) as systemName, a.AGENCYDESC AS agencydesc, case when a.STATUS = '0' then a.REGISTERURL when a.STATUS = '1' then '已失效' end AS REGISTERURL, a.ACTTIME, case when a.STATUS='0' then '未激活' when a.STATUS='1' then '已激活' end as status from (select T1.AGENCY_ID, T1.COMPANYNAME, T1.COMPANYBRIEFNAME, T1.ContactsName, T1.ONLINECHANNEL, T1.VESTAGENCY, T1.VESTBRAND, T1.COMPANYPHONE, T1.COMPANYEMAIL, T1.COMPANYADDR, T1.CERTIFICATES, T1.LEGAL_INFO, T1.ORGANIZATIONCODE, T1.AGREEMENTCODE, T1.PROVINCEID, T1.CITYID, T1.AGENCY_STATUS, T1.ACCOUNTBANK as AccountBank, T1.BANKID as bankId, T1.ACCOUNTNAME as accountName, T1.BANKCODE as bankcode, T1.CREATEID, T1.CREATEDT as createDt, T1.SYSTEMID AS systemId, T1.AGENCYDESC AS agencydesc, T1.USERPID AS userpId, T1.someoneName as someoneName, T1.someonePhone as someonePhone, T2.STATUS, T2.REGISTER_URL AS registerUrl, T2.ACT_TIME AS actTime from rtb_qt1tblagency T1 left join rtb_agency_setup T2 on T1.agency_id = T2.agency_id where 1 = 1
AND T1.SYSTEMID=#systemId#
AND T1.PROVINCEID=#provinceId#
AND T1.CITYID=#cityId#
and T1.AGENCY_ID=#agency_id#
and T1.COMPANYNAME like '%$companyName$%'
and T1.agency_status=#agency_status#
and T2.STATUS=#status#
and T1.ONLINECHANNEL=#depagencyId# or T1.AGENCY_ID=#depagencyId#
START WITH T1.AGENCY_ID =#depagencyId# CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.AGENCY_ID = T1.ONLINECHANNEL
order by T1.CREATEDT desc ) a ) b where rownum <= #end#) where rn> #start#
select count(AGENCY_ID) from rtb_qt1tblagency where AGENCY_ID=#agencyId#

select DISTINCT T1.AGENCY_ID as agency_id, T1.COMPANYNAME as companyName,
T1.COMPANYBRIEFNAME as companyBriefName, T1.ContactsName AS ContactsName, T1.ONLINECHANNEL as upperAgencyid, GETUPPERAGENCYNAMEBYID(T1.ONLINECHANNEL) as uppercompanyName, T1.VESTAGENCY as vestagencyId, GETUPPERAGENCYNAMEBYID(T1.VESTAGENCY) as vestagencyName, T1.COMPANYPHONE as companyPhone, T1.COMPANYEMAIL as companyEmail, T1.COMPANYADDR as companyAddr, T1.CERTIFICATES as certificate, T1.LEGAL_INFO as legal_info, T1.ORGANIZATIONCODE as organizationCode, T1.AGREEMENTCODE as agreementcode, T1.PROVINCEID as provinceId, T1.CITYID as cityId, GETCITYNAMEBYID(CITYID) as cityName , GETPROVINCENAMEBYID(PROVINCEID) as provinceName, T1.AGENCY_STATUS as agency_status, case when T1.AGENCY_STATUS='1' then '待审核' when T1.AGENCY_STATUS='2' then '审核通过' when T1.AGENCY_STATUS='3' then '审核未通过' else '无效' end as agencystatusSrc, T1.ACCOUNTBANK as AccountBank, T1.BANKID as bankId, T1.ACCOUNTNAME as accountName, T1.BANKCODE as bankcode, GETUSERNAMEBYID(T1.CREATEID) as createId, T1.CREATEDT as createDt, T1.AGENCYDESC AS agencydesc, T1.SYSTEMID AS systemId, GETSYSTEMNAMEBYID(T1.SYSTEMID) as systemName from rtb_qt1tblagency T1 where ONLINECHANNEL=#depagencyId# and T1.AGENCY_STATUS !='0'
and SYSTEMID=#systemId#
and T1.AGENCY_ID=#agency_id#
and T1.COMPANYNAME like '%$companyName$%'
and T1.AGENCY_STATUS=#agency_status#

SELECT DISTINCT T1.AGENCY_ID as agencyId, T1.COMPANYNAME as agencyName, case when T1.ONLINECHANNEL is null then '-1' else T1.ONLINECHANNEL end isparent, case when T2.AGENCY_ID is null then '0' else '1' end as ischild FROM ( select t.AGENCY_ID, t.COMPANYNAME, t.ONLINECHANNEL from rtb_qt1tblagency t
t.SYSTEMID=#systemId#
t.ONLINECHANNEL=#agencyId# OR t.AGENCY_ID =#agencyId#
START WITH t.AGENCY_ID =#agencyId# CONNECT BY PRIOR t.AGENCY_ID = t.ONLINECHANNEL
) T1 LEFT JOIN ( select t.AGENCY_ID, t.COMPANYNAME, t.ONLINECHANNEL from rtb_qt1tblagency t
t.SYSTEMID=#systemId#
START WITH t.AGENCY_ID =#agencyId# CONNECT BY PRIOR t.AGENCY_ID = t.ONLINECHANNEL ) T2 ON T1.AGENCY_ID=T2.ONLINECHANNEL order by isparent

SELECT TA1.AGENCY_ID,ta1.COMPANYNAME, CASE WHEN TA2.ONLINECHANNEL IS NULL THEN '0' WHEN TA2.ONLINECHANNEL IS NOT NULL THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS ISPARENT FROM rtb_qt1tblagency TA1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ONLINECHANNEL FROM rtb_qt1tblagency) TA2 ON TA1.AGENCY_ID = TA2.ONLINECHANNEL where ta1.onlinechannel = #agencyId#
AND ta1.SYSTEMID=#systemId#

SELECT AGENCY_ID, COMPANYNAME, AGENCY_STATUS FROM rtb_qt1tblagency WHERE AGENCY_STATUS >='2' AND AGENCY_ID =#agencyId#
AND SYSTEMID=#systemId#
sqlMap.update:
update rtb_qt1tblagency
SYSTEMID=#systemId#
companyName=#companyName#
COMPANYBRIEFNAME=#companyBriefName#
COMPANYEMAIL=#companyEmail#
COMPANYADDR=#companyAddr#
CERTIFICATES=#certificate#
LEGAL_INFO=#legal_info#
ORGANIZATIONCODE=#organizationCode#
AGREEMENTCODE=#agreementcode#
PROVINCEID=#provinceId#
CITYID=#cityId#
VESTAGENCY=#vestagencyId#
ACCOUNTBANK=#accountBank#
BANKID=#bankId#
ACCOUNTNAME=#accountName#
BANKCODE=#bankcode#
BOUNCEDTIME=#bouncedTime#
agency_status=#agency_status#
someoneName=#someoneName#
someonePhone=#someonePhone#
where AGENCY_ID=#agency_id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into rtb_qt1tblagency( AGENCY_ID, SYSTEMID, CONTACTSNAME, COMPANYNAME,
COMPANYBRIEFNAME, COMPANYPHONE, COMPANYEMAIL, COMPANYADDR, CERTIFICATES, LEGAL_INFO, ORGANIZATIONCODE, AGREEMENTCODE, PROVINCEID, CITYID, ONLINECHANNEL, VESTAGENCY, AGENCY_STATUS, ACCOUNTBANK, BANKID, ACCOUNTNAME, BANKCODE, CREATEID, CREATEDT, VESTBRAND, someoneName, someonePhone, userpId )values( #agency_id#, #systemId#, #contactsName#, #companyName#, #companyBriefName#, #companyPhone#, #companyEmail#, #companyAddr#, #certificate#, #legal_info#, #organizationCode#, #agreementcode#, #provinceId#, #cityId#, #upperAgencyid#, #vestagencyId#, #agency_status#, #accountBank#, #bankId#, #accountName#, #bankcode#, #createId#, #createDt#, #vestBrandId#, #someoneName#, #someonePhone#, #userpId# )
sqlMap.select: select ids from ( select SUBSTR(AGENCY_ID, 5, 5) ids from rtb_qt1tblagency where AGENCY_ID LIKE '$agencyId$%' order by length(ids) desc,ids DESC ) where rownum=1
sqlMap.update: update rtb_qt1tblagency set AGENCY_STATUS=#agencystatus#, AGENCYDESC=#agencydesc# where AGENCY_ID=#agencyid#
sqlMap.select: select PROVINCEID,PROVINCENAME from qtfr2.PROVINCEINFO
select CITYID, CITYNAME from qtfr2.CITYINFO where PROVINCEID=#provinceId#
select areaid CITYID,areaname CITYNAME from areainfo where cityid=#provinceId#
select AGENCY_ID as AGENCYID, COMPANYNAME AS AGENCYNAME from rtb_qt1tblagency where ONLINECHANNEL=#agencyId#
SELECT COUNT (ONLYCODE) FROM rtb_QT1TBLTERMINAL WHERE AGENCYID =#agencyId#
SELECT COUNT (AGENCY_ID) FROM rtb_qt1tblagency WHERE ONLINECHANNEL=#agencyId# AND AGENCY_STATUS <>'0'

SELECT levelCode FROM (SELECT LEVEL levelCode, T.AGENCY_ID, T.ONLINECHANNEL FROM rtb_qt1tblagency T START WITH T.AGENCY_ID = #startAgency# CONNECT BY PRIOR T.AGENCY_ID = T.ONLINECHANNEL) C WHERE C.AGENCY_ID = #agencyId#
select A.AGENCY_ID AS agencyId,A.COMPANYNAME as agencyName from rtb_qt1tblagency A where A.AGENCY_ID=#agencyId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE rtb_qt1tblagency SET VESTBRAND=#vestBrand# WHERE AGENCY_ID IN ( SELECT T.AGENCY_ID FROM rtb_qt1tblagency T START WITH T.AGENCY_ID = #agencyId# CONNECT BY PRIOR T.AGENCY_ID = T.ONLINECHANNEL )
sqlMap.select: select to_number(a.agency_id) as id, case when a.onlinechannel=#agencyId# then 0 else to_number(a.onlinechannel) end as pId,a.companyname as name, case when b.onlinechannel is not null then 1 else 0 end isParent, 0 as open from (select * from rtb_qt1tblagency a where a.agency_status >='2' and a.ONLINECHANNEL =#agencyId# ) a left join ( select distinct onlinechannel from rtb_qt1tblagency where agency_status >='2' START WITH AGENCY_ID =#agencyId# CONNECT BY PRIOR AGENCY_ID = ONLINECHANNEL) b on a.agency_id=b.onlinechannel order by pid
select a.vestagency from rtb_qt1tblagency a where a.agency_id = #agencyId#

select
from rtb_qt1tblagency q where q.agency_id = #agencyId#
sqlMap.update: update rtb_qt1tblagency set RENAMECOMPANYNAME=#renameCompanyName#, CONTACTSNAME =#contactsName#, COMPANYEMAIL = #companyEmail#,COMPANYPHONE = #companyPhone#, BOUNCEDTIME = #bouncedTime# where agency_id = #agency_id#
sqlMap.select:
select * from ( select tmp_page.*, rownum row_id from ( select T1.AGENCY_ID, T1.COMPANYNAME from rtb_qt1tblagency T1
T1.AGENCY_ID like '%$agency_id$%'
T1.COMPANYNAME like '%$companyName$%'
T1.AGENCY_ID <> #ownAgencyId#
START WITH T1.AGENCY_ID =#depagencyId# CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.AGENCY_ID = T1.ONLINECHANNEL ) tmp_page where rownum <= #end# ) where row_id > #start#

select count(1) from rtb_qt1tblagency T1
T1.AGENCY_ID like '%$agency_id$%'
T1.COMPANYNAME like '%$companyName$%'
T1.AGENCY_ID <> #ownAgencyId#
START WITH T1.AGENCY_ID =#depagencyId# CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.AGENCY_ID = T1.ONLINECHANNEL

select * from ( select tmp_page.*, rownum row_id from ( select T1.AGENCY_ID, T1.COMPANYNAME from rtb_qt1tblagency T1
(T1.AGENCY_ID like '%$agency_id$%'
T1.COMPANYNAME like '%$companyName$%')
T1.AGENCY_ID <> #ownAgencyId#
T1.ONLINECHANNEL =#depagencyId#
) tmp_page where rownum <= #end# ) where row_id > #start#

select count(1) from rtb_qt1tblagency T1
T1.AGENCY_ID like '%$agency_id$%'
T1.COMPANYNAME like '%$companyName$%'
T1.AGENCY_ID <> #ownAgencyId#
T1.ONLINECHANNEL =#depagencyId#
select * from rtb_qt1tblagency where agency_id = #agencyid#
sqlMap.update: update RTB_QT1TBLAGENCY t set t.contactsname = #contactsName#, t.userpid = #userpId#, t.companyemail = #companyEmail#, t.agency_status = '3' where t.agency_id = #agency_id#
sqlMap.select: select count(1) from rtb_qt1tblagency T1 where T1.onlinechannel = 'RTB00000000' and T1.agency_id = (select distinct agencyid from users t1 where t1.userloginname = #loginName#)
select count(1) from rtb_qt1tblagency T1 where T1.companyName = #companyName#

select agency_id,COMPANYNAME companyName,RENAMECOMPANYNAME renameCompanyName,CONTACTSNAME contactsName,COMPANYEMAIL companyEmail,COMPANYPHONE companyPhone, BOUNCEDTIME bouncedTime, onlinechannel, userpid userpId, agency_status from rtb_qt1tblagency q where q.companyphone = #companyphone# and q.contactsname is not null and q.userpid is not null and rownum = 1 order by q.createdt desc
sqlMap.update:
update RTB_QT1TBLAGENCY
COMPANYPHONE= #companyPhone:VARCHAR#
CONTACTSNAME = #contactsName:VARCHAR#
USERPID = #userpId:VARCHAR#
AGENCY_STATUS = #agency_status:VARCHAR#
COMPANYEMAIL = #companyEmail:VARCHAR#
COMPANYADDR = #companyAddr:VARCHAR#
CERTIFICATES = #certificate:VARCHAR#
LEGAL_INFO = #legal_info:VARCHAR#
ORGANIZATIONCODE = #organizationCode:VARCHAR#
AGREEMENTCODE = #agreementcode:VARCHAR#
PROVINCEID = #provinceId:VARCHAR#
CITYID = #cityId:VARCHAR#
ACCOUNTBANK = #accountBank:VARCHAR#
BANKID = #bankId:VARCHAR#
ACCOUNTNAME = #accountName:VARCHAR#
BANKCODE = #bankcode:VARCHAR#
AGENCYDESC = #agencydesc:VARCHAR#
COMPANYBRIEFNAME = #companyBriefName:VARCHAR#
RENAMECOMPANYNAME = #renameCompanyName:VARCHAR#
SOMEONEPHONE = #someonePhone:VARCHAR#
SOMEONENAME = #someoneName:VARCHAR#
where AGENCY_ID = #agency_id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into RTB_AGENCY_SETUP (AGENCY_ID, SET_DATE, SET_TIME, REGISTER_URL, STATUS, AGENCYMAC, IS_NOTE, ACT_TIME, IS_NOTE_PARENT, IS_NOTE_LOGIN) values (#agencyId:VARCHAR#, #setDate:VARCHAR#, #setTime:VARCHAR#, #registerUrl:VARCHAR#, #status:CHAR#, #agencymac:VARCHAR#, #isNote:CHAR#, #actTime:VARCHAR#, #isNoteParent:CHAR#, #isNoteLogin:CHAR#)
